caption.center: STATE of Maine v. Richard F. BLACK.

opinion.posture: Appeal from the Superior Court, Kennebec County.
opinion.attorneys:
Joseph M. Jabar, Dist. Atty. (orally), Wayne R. Theriault, Legal Intern, Augusta, for plaintiff.
Lipman, Parks, Livingston Lipman, P.A., by John M. Parks (orally), Roger J. Katz, Augusta, for defendant.
opinion.panel: Before McKUSICK, C.J., and ARCHIBALD, DELAHANTY, GODFREY and NICHOLS, JJ.Page 61
opinion.opinion_text:
MEMORANDUM OF DECISION Our decision in this case is governed by our decision in Statev. Kimball, Me., 359 A.2d 305 (1976).
The entry is:
Appeal denied.
Judgment affirmed.
POMEROY and WERNICK, JJ., did not sit.
